Frequently Asked Questions

  1. What is the full form of SRM university?

Sri Ramaswamy memorial institute of Science and Technology University.

  1. SRM is famous for?

It is one of the best premier engineering institutes in India.

  1. What is the highest salary package?

In 2021 highest package was for 35 LPA but the package has also gone up to 40-45 LPA in past years.

  1. What was the highest package in 2020?

In 2020 the highest package was 41 LPA.

  1. How is campus life in SRM?

The campus is clean and green. Campus life is happening and soothing in SRM because of it's amazing infrastructure and all type of facilities available in the campus.

  1. Is there any uniform in SRM?

No, there is no uniform in SRM but students are asked to wear formals and decent clothes while coming to college.

  1. Phones are allowed in SRM?

Yes, phone is allowed in SRM but while lectures you can not use phone and in library usage of phone is strictly prohibited.

  1. Can someone change the SRM campus?

For changing the campus student should contact the admission department first, but there is no guarantee that they will change your campus. Changing of campus depends upon the seat availability in other campus.

  1. Is it compulsory for students to stay in hostel?

No, it is not compulsory for anyone to stay in college hostel.

  1. Which SRM campus is best for engineering?

Chennai SRM is best for engineering out of all the other SRM campuses.
